desc: Rug House AU is one of the biggest importer of Oriental carpets and cowhide rugs. We are specialized in high-quality wool rugs/carpets and animal skins. All vintage hand-knotted Persian/Turkish rugs and hides are individually handpicked to enjoy the best experience of luxury.

layout.text:
UP TO 60% OFF
STOREWIDE ON ALL
ORIENTAL RUGS

Rug House AU is one of the biggest importer of Persian rugs. We are specialized in high-quality wool rugs/carpets. All vintage hand-knotted rugs are individually handpicked to enjoy the best experience of luxury.
